Hi:
 
Please ignore the first email by me. I pressed the wrong key and sent an unfinished email to you. Although I am not the most knowlegeable when it comes to samurai (compared to my other fellow afficionados)  I can tell you one thing about the samurai's attitude towards their lives. They stated that their lives were like a cherry blossom. Brief but beautiful. In other words carpe diem, seize the day 'cause you don't know when you might die.
 
Later,
Rod
 
obeso9 <rsesma@...> wrote:


Hey all,

   I am new to this group and am excited about learning more about the 
samurai way and their history. My first question is if anybody know of 
where to get information on what spiritual practices the samurai 
followed. Please send anything if you have it. Thanx.
